content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: --LLOQ
      operator: exists
    - name:
      operator:
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SDTMIG.CG0466
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Trigger error when --LLOQ is not expressed using the units in --STRESU
Outcome:
  Message: --LLOQ is not expressed using the units in --STRESU
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0466
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Units will be those used for --STRESU.
                Document: Model v2.0
                Item: --LLOQ
                Section: Findings
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - FINDINGS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL
